name: Vine Dash
description:
The world is being overtaken by vines! Where did they come from? Why is this happening? It doesn't matter! You just need to escape!!!

Use your rollerskates to outrun the vines, dodging them as they sprout from the ground.

When you get fast enough, you can even slash open some vines.

Controls:

Arrow keys to dodge

One of the keys: Q,W,E,R need to be pressed as the slashable vines appear.
